name: String

methods.name: toString
methods.description: Returns itself.

methods.name: toSource
methods.description: Creates a string representation of this object that can be fed back to

methods.name: valueOf
methods.description: Returns itself.

methods.name: charAt
methods.description: Returns the character at the specified index.

parameters.name: index
parameters.description: An integer between 0 and string.length -1, specifying the character to return.

methods.name: charCodeAt
methods.description: Returns the Unicode value of the character at the given index.

parameters.name: index
parameters.description: An integer between 0 and string.length -1, specifying the character.

methods.name: concat
methods.description: If necessary, converts the one or more given values to strings.

parameters.name: value
parameters.description: The values to be concatenated with the given string.

methods.name: indexOf
methods.description: Returns the index within the string of the first occurrence of the specified string, starting the search at fromIndex if provided.

parameters.name: searchValue
parameters.description: The string for which to search.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The starting offset of the search.

methods.name: lastIndexOf
methods.description: Returns the index within the string of the last occurrence of the specified value.

parameters.name: searchValue
parameters.description: The string for which to search.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The starting offset of the search.

methods.name: slice
methods.description: Extracts a substring of the given string and returns it as a new string.

parameters.name: startSlice
parameters.description: The index at which to begin extraction.

parameters.name: endSlice
parameters.description: The index at which to end extraction.

methods.name: toLowerCase
methods.description: Returns a new string which contains all the characters of the original string converted to lowercase.

methods.name: toUpperCase
methods.description: Returns a new string which contains all the characters of the original string converted to uppercase.

methods.name: toLocaleLowerCase
methods.description: Returns a new string which contains all the characters of the original string converted to lowercase (localized).

methods.name: toLocaleUpperCase
methods.description: Returns a new string which contains all the characters of the original string converted to uppercase (localized).

methods.name: localeCompare
methods.description: Performs a localized comparison of two strings.

parameters.name: what
parameters.description: The string to compare with.

methods.name: match
methods.description: Matches a string against a regular expression.

parameters.name: regexp
parameters.description: The regular expression to use.

methods.name: split
methods.description: Splits a string into a group of substrings, places those strings in an array, and returns the array.

parameters.name: delimiter
parameters.description: Specifies the string to use for delimiting.

methods.name: substr
methods.description: Returns a string containing the characters beginning at the specified index, start, through the specified number of characters.

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: Location at which to begin extracting characters.

parameters.name: length
parameters.description: (OptIonal) The number of characters to extract.

methods.name: substring
methods.description: Returns a substring of the given string by extracting characters from indexA up to but not including indexB.

parameters.name: indexA
parameters.description: The index to begin extracting.

parameters.name: indexB
parameters.description: (Optional) The index at which to end extraction.

methods.name: anchor
methods.description: Returns a string consisting of this string enclosed in a <a> tag.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The text to be stored in the anchors' name attribute.

methods.name: big
methods.description: Returns a string consisting of this string enclosed in a <big> tag.

methods.name: blink
methods.description: Returns a string consisting of this string enclosed in a <blink> tag.

methods.name: bold
methods.description: Returns a string consisting of this string enclosed in a <b> tag.

methods.name: fixed
methods.description: Returns a string consisting of this string enclosed in a <tt> tag.

methods.name: fontcolor
methods.description: Returns a string consisting of this string enclosed in a <font> tag.

parameters.name: color
parameters.description: The value to be stored in the tag's color attribute.

methods.name: fontsize
methods.description: Returns a string consisting of this string enclosed in a <font> tag.

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: The value to be stored in the tag's size attribute.

methods.name: italics
methods.description: Returns a string consisting of this string enclosed in a <i> tag.

methods.name: link
methods.description: Returns a string consisting of this string enclosed in a <a> tag.

parameters.name: href
parameters.description: The value to be stored in the tag's href attribute.

methods.name: small
methods.description: Returns a string consisting of this string enclosed in a <small> tag.

methods.name: strike
methods.description: Returns a string consisting of this string enclosed in a <strike> tag.

methods.name: sub
methods.description: Returns a string consisting of this string enclosed in a <sub> tag.

methods.name: sup
methods.description: Returns a string consisting of this string enclosed in a <sup> tag.

description: A character string. Each character is adressable by index.
